title: [LFT] Silver Player (Experianced 3 years) Gold last season (ID: deathscar0908)
body:
Hi i am a Current silver ranked player, i was about to reach gold again in s1 in eune but moved to Australia and had to switch region so they placed in in B1 after switch. i can play top and mid proficiently, and fill other roles as well. Good team player and can be on skype or any other voice system available. Add me if interested,
Thank you
